decisions.description: Check the existing discount type.Based on Discount Type CC code varies (In HU only one CC Code Exists for CARE and FERA)

decisions.description: if customer has a C AE CARE (ESA, LIHEAP, REACH) or a H RAND CERT or a RANDOM CERT or a C RANDOM AFTER the V/VE code (in the last two years). If so terminate the transaction with Status=Cancelled.
